snippet: David Joyce, a county prosecutor, will replace Representative Steven C. LaTourette as the Republican nominee in Ohio's 14th Congressional District, entering the race as the favored candidate.
abstract: David Joyce, a county prosecutor, will replace Representative Steven C. LaTourette as the Republican nominee in Ohio's 14th Congressional District, entering the race as the favored candidate.

headline.main: Republicans Pick Ballot Replacement for Ohio Congressman
